result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel Luis Ruiz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: The costs are to be added to defendant's current payment plan.  Defendant shall submit to a DNA sample immediately after sentencing.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel Luis Ruiz

Defendant Daniel Luis Ruiz in court with attorney Shawn M Paul.  Defendant Daniel Luis Ruiz in custody.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea agreement put into the record.  Plea of no contest.    Plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; factual basis exists.  Court finds defendant guilty and orders court costs; DNA surcharge of $200.00 and submit to DNA sample immediately after sentencing.  Costs are to be added to defendant's current payment plan but payments increase to $50.00 a month beginning November 3, 2015.
Order for Appearance at Settlement Conference; Report to Court on Results of Settlement Conference.

Defendant Daniel Luis Ruiz in court with attorney Shawn M Paul.  Defendant Daniel Luis Ruiz in custody.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waive reading of complaint.  Plea of not guilty to all charges.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 23, 2015 at 11:30 am.   - rt
Petition for Appointment of Counsel, Affidavit of Indigency and Order - granted
to reimburse county for attorney fees
*Defendant shall not leave the State of Wisconsin without prior notice to and written approval of the Court.  Must report to the Taylor County Sheriff's Office for Booking Procedure.

Defendant Daniel Luis Ruiz in court, in custody.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court informs defendant of charges and penalties.  Defendant would like an attorney.  Court orders $500.00 signature bond; booking.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 16, 2015 at 01:00 pm.  - rt
